titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of, in the visitacion, of the ryght reuerende father in God, Ioh[a]n Bysshop of Lyncol[n]n, in the sixte yeare of the reygne of our moste drade souereygne lorde kynge Edwarde the sixte [et]c. with certayne generall aduertysementes, then gyuen by the sayd bysshop to the clergie and people of his dioces, for an uniformitie, to be obserued in the same. Anno d[omi]ni, 1552.
Visitation articles. 1552
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Lincoln. Bishop (1552-1554 : Taylor)
Taylor, John, 1503?-1554.
